name: Red Rover (itch) (n00begon)
description:
You are a rover on Mars. Carefully manage and repair your components as you explore Mars to discover and drill into ice. Try to complete your research before you are too broken to continue and repair yourself along the way. FOR SCIENCE! Use the Mouse and Arrow keys to control your rover and conduct the research. Don’t forget your wheels.

Created for Global Game Jam 2020

Art:
Daisy Amos

Programming:
Adam Campbell
Tate Kennington
Tim Neumegen

Sounds:
Drilling Sound by Mike Koenig (CC 3.0)
Sci Fi Robot Sound by Mike Koenig (CC 3.0)
Switch Sound by Mike Koenig (CC 3.0)
Metal Bang by Caroline Ford  (CC 3.0)

Music:
Severe Tire Damage by Kevin MacLeod  (CC 4.0)
